sentence.Network_en: I had a persecution complex and thought people were conspiring against me.
sentence.Network_cn: 我有过被害情结，认为大家都在密谋暗算我。

sentence.Network_en: It is the memory and threat of persecution that binds them together.
sentence.Network_cn: 遭受迫害的记忆和威胁把他们紧紧联系在一起。

sentence.Network_en: He had fled from France at the time of the persecution.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在大迫害时期逃离了法国.

entry.tran: （尤指因宗教、政治信仰或种族而受到的）迫害
entry.def: Persecution is cruel and unfair treatment of a person or group, especially because of their religious or political beliefs, or their race.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of persecuting (especially on the basis of race or religion)

stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+secut跟随,追+ive……的→一个接一个的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 连续, 条理, 逻辑顺序
stems_affixes.word_buile: con全部+secut跟随,追+ion表名词→一个接一个

stems_affixes.value_cn: 执行, 实行, 完成, 处死
stems_affixes.word_buile: ex出去,即出去做+secut跟随,追+e→execute→[判决]之后而来的就是执行
per始终+secut跟随,追+e→从头跟到尾→跟踪→迫害
pro在前+secut追随+e→追随到[法院]前面→检举;指控

sentences.en: It is worthwhile to note that both suffered persecution.
sentences.cn: 值得注意的是,双方都受到过迫害。

sentences.en: For pity’s sake try to stop this persecution.
sentences.cn: 做做好事,设法制止这场迫害吧。

sentences.en: He had fled from France at the time of the persecution.
sentences.cn: 他在大迫害时期逃离了法国。
